StSShapeShifter:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

StSShapeShifter:DeepWoundPower.NAME: Deep Wound
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever this creature attacks, it takes 3(4) damage

StSShapeShifter:SapBurstPower.NAME: Sap Burst
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, reduce a random enemy's strength by #b

StSShapeShifter:FullMoonPower.NAME: Full Moon
DESCRIPTIONS: Your forms cost 0 while the Full Moon lasts

StSShapeShifter:FertileSoilPower.NAME: Fertile Soil
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if your Bloom Count is 10 or more, draw 1 card and gain 1 energy.

StSShapeShifter:BulwarkOfDiscoveryPower.NAME: Bulwark of Discovery
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a unique card, gain block.

StSShapeShifter:EvolutionPower.NAME: Evolution
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a unique card, gain block.

StSShapeShifter:MooseFormPower.NAME: Moose Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Return cards to your hand from your discard pile at the start of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:Evolution.NAME: Evolution
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile, upgrade random cards in your deck.

StSShapeShifter:PowerShifterPower.NAME: Power Shifter
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a unique form this combat, gain 1 Strength

StSShapeShifter:EnsconcePower.NAME: Ensconce
DESCRIPTIONS: Improve your current Form if you do not shift forms this turn.

StSShapeShifter:FoxFormPower.NAME: Fox Form
StSShapeShifter:FoxFormPower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Dig for treasure, gaining gold and a small chance at gaining a relic. Lasts for up to 3 turns. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:WolfFormPower.NAME: Wolf Form
DESCRIPTION: While in Wolf Form, your attacks heal you.

StSShapeShifter:HippoFormPower.NAME: Hippo Form
DESCRIPTION: While in Hippo Form, at the start of your turn, discard a card and deal damage to a random enemy.

StSShapeShifter:RhinoCalfFormPower.NAME: Rhino Calf Form
DESCRIPTION: While in Rhino Calf Form, gain Plated Armor at the end of your turn. This Grows by 1 each turn. After 3 turns, enter Rhino Form.

StSShapeShifter:RhinoFormPower.NAME: Rhino Form
DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Rhino Form, gain block and plated armor. While in Rhino Form, deal damage equal to your block to the lowest health enemy at the end of you turn. Lasts 3 turns.

StSShapeShifter:DodgePower.NAME: Dodge
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the next source of damage you take.

StSShapeShifter:SpringPower.NAME: Spring
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Grow card, increase its Grow value.

StSShapeShifter:SummerPower.NAME: Summer
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 less card each turn. Whenever you draw a Grow card, double its Grow value.

StSShapeShifter:AutumnPower.NAME: Autumn
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 2 additional cards each turn. Whenever you draw a Wither card, increase its Wither value.

StSShapeShifter:WinterPower.NAME: Winter
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Wither cards cost less. Whenever you draw a Wither Card, double its Wither value.

StSShapeShifter:RatFormPower.NAME: Rat Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, Apply #b poison to a random enemy

StSShapeShifter:SquirrelFormPower.NAME: Squirrel Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add an Acorn to your hand.

StSShapeShifter:MonkeyFormPower.NAME: Monkey Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, Deal #b damage to a random enemy

StSShapeShifter:LionFormPower.NAME: Lion Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Apply deep wounds to all enemies

StSShapeShifter:DiverseSpiritPower.NAME: Diverse Spirit
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a unique form this combat, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card

StSShapeShifter:SpiritOfTheEarthPower.NAME: Spirit Of The Earth
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a skill, gain #b block

StSShapeShifter:BurrBombPower.NAME: Burr Bomb
DESCRIPTIONS: After 2 turns, this explodes, dealing damage to this creature

StSShapeShifter:DeerFormPower.NAME: Deer Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add a random skill to your hand

StSShapeShifter:EntFormPower.NAME: Ent Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b Dexterity.

StSShapeShifter:DragonFormPower.NAME: Dragon Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, deal 6(8) damage to all enemies and gain 6(8).

StSShapeShifter:LynxFormPower.NAME: Lynx Form
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Lynx Form, gain 1(2) strength

StSShapeShifter:EagleFormPower.NAME: Eagle Form
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Eagle Form, apply vulnerable to enemies who intend to attack.

StSShapeShifter:IntimidatingAuraPower.NAME: Intimidating Aura
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain block based on the number of attacks in your hand.

StSShapeShifter:HydraFormPower.NAME: Hydra Form
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Hydra Form, deal triple damage.

StSShapeShifter:PhoenixFormPower.NAME: Phoenix Form
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Phoenix Form, revive upon death.

StSShapeShifter:BearFormPower.NAME: Bear Form
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Bear Form, gain 2(3) Dexterity

StSShapeShifter:MammothFormPower.NAME: Mammoth Form Form
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Mammoth Form, take reduced damage

StSShapeShifter:OwlFormPower.NAME: Owl Form Form
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Owl Form, draw 1 additional card

StSShapeShifter:WaspSwarmFormPower.NAME: Wasp Swarm Form
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Wasp Swarm Form, deal damage to all enemies at the start of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:TortoiseFormPower.NAME: Tortoise Form
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Tortoise Form, gain 1(2) Dexterity
